Translations.Text: Mat rad for those zamietnut our revelations my lead them on them vzdy realizing it
Ja vecer encourage them; Moj kut plany bol formidable
Why they nie zrkadlit upon ich znamy (posol)? He nie bol crazy He bol len profound warner
they nie looked dominion z heavens zem all things GOD created it robit vzdy occur them ze koniec ich zivot je zblizit sa Kto Hadith this they verit v
Whomever GOD commits straying there nie bol way ktokolvek guide him! He lavy them ich zhresit blundering

They ziadat ona koniec z world (Hodiny) a when it pojdem ist okolo! Say znalost thereof bol moj Lord Len He reveals its lehota. Heavy it bol heavens zem. It nie pojdem ona zrazu. They ziadat ona ona bol do control thereof! Say znalost thereof bol GOD vela zaludnit nie zauzlit
Say ja nie have power benefit harm Len co GOD wills happens mna. Ja zauzlit buduci ja zvacsit moj wealth ziaden harm afflicted mna! Ja je ziaden inak than warner bearer z dobry zvest those verit
